label: occurrencePeriod
comment: A specified period of time during which this supply chain event occurs.
A specified period of time during which this transport event occurs.
A specified period of time for the occurrence of this referenced transport event.

rangeIncludes.comment: A specific period of time such as the length of time between two known date/time points, from a start date onwards, or up to an end date.

domainIncludes.comment: A significant occurrence or happening in a supply chain.
